thread.title: Teachers & Librarians! Possible FREE Kid’s Meal At Chipotle With Reading Rewards Program
thread.title_full: Teachers & Librarians! Possible FREE Kid’s Meal At Chipotle With Reading Rewards Program

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Teachers & Librarians! Possible FREE Kid’s Meal At Chipotle With Reading Rewards Program
text:
Heads up teachers & librarians! While supplies last, head on over to Chipotle.com where they are offering up a Reading Rewards Program geared for grades K-5 where students can earn FREE kid’s meals for daily reading !
Just head on over here to submit your application (make sure “reading rewards” is selected) – note that a valid school or library email address is required. If you are approved, you will be emailed a custom reading log, which you can ask your readers to color in each day that they have read 15-20 minutes. Reward cards will be shipped directly to the school or district upon approval.

Note that quantities are limited and only one application per school is allowed per year so be sure to share with all the teachers and staff so that your application represents the whole school. Head here to download an email template to easily share with other teachers. 
The free kid’s meal cards will be valid through the date specified and for in-restaurant orders only. This offer may not be combined with other coupons, promotions, or special offers and is valid at participating Chipotle locations only.
(Thanks, Coupon Pro Blog )
